startup.title: Toolkit - NbS for Water Security
startup.subtitle:
Digital tool for incorporating
nature-based solutions into water security projects
startup.question: What would you like to do?
startup.disclaimer: Pre-feasibility analysis tool for Nature-based Solutions in water security projects. Results are recommendations generated from global databases and user information, which must be verified and detailed in later project phases and do not replace detailed designs of solutions to be implemented

sbn_prioritization.no_selection_error: You must select at least one NbS to continue

report.title: Final Analysis Report - Project
report.intro_text:
This document was automatically generated by the digital tool of the Methodological Framework for Incorporating Nature-Based Solutions into CAF Water Security Projects, version 2.0. The analyses were generated from global databases and local information provided by the user. The results generated correspond to pre-feasibility recommendations that must be verified and detailed in later phases of the project and do not replace the detailed designs of the solutions to be implemented.
For more information on the Methodological Framework and the digital tool, please contact the CAF team.
report.footnote: * Note: A) Climate change adaptation, B) Biodiversity and other environmental objectives, M) Climate change mitigation
